title: Gridnik from The Foundry
content: Does anyone know how/where online to purchase the font Gridnik from british typographers, The Foundry?
author: dreamjar

comments.content: Hmm. My old link for the Foundry doesn't work any longer. Looks like you can contact them [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012403/http:/www.on-idle.com/foundry/) - but there's no online purchasing options :-/

Thanks, I did "request information". Unfortunately The Foundry isn't as quick with it's responses as your average Typophile moderator. You'd imagine they'd either be selling their font through their own site or licensing another provider (like fontshop) to sell it.

\> [www.foundrytypes.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012403/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/) ( The Foundry )..   
( I just recently noticed that they changed their domain.. )

Well, there _is_ a link saying "Request information" Matthew...   
Seems pretty obvious what to do. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012403im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Keep us informed about the Foudry situation if you   
don't mind. I haven't got a clue how user-friendly   
they are, but I've got serious doubts. That'd help us   
help others at future inquiries about Foundry types.
